description:
More than just logging your Miles with (or without) GPS, Plus 3 actually donates money to charity for everything you log with Plus 3 Mobile. The app is an easy way to keep track of your mileage, hours, pace, speed, route, and stats for all kinds of exercise, and when it uploads to our server we move money to charity. You can pay a lot more for a Garmin watch, or use your phone, the one thing you carry with you, to turn any walk, run, bike ride mile into money for good causes. Or just log time in the gym, at the yoga studio, or swimming pool and every hour moves money to charity. Being a Plus 3 member is free, but it's priceless to charities.

On the www.plus3network.com website we offer leader boards, friend activity feeds, challenges and rewards, and a tally of your fundraising - all FREE.
